hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT {documents.*} FROM BUSINESS_DOCUMENTS documents left join DOCUMENT_EXTENDED_FIELDS extended_fields ON documents.ID = extended_fields.PAYMENT_ID AND extended_fields.NAME = 'auto-sub-friendy-name' WHERE documents.IS_LONG_OFFER = 1 AND documents.LOGIN_ID = :loginId AND documents.CREATION_DATE >= :extra_fromDate AND documents.CREATION_DATE <= :extra_toDate
AND documents.CREATED_EMPLOYEE_LOGIN_ID is not null AND ((:extra_name is null OR :extra_name = '') OR (extended_fields.NAME = 'auto-sub-friendy-name' AND extended_fields.VALUE like :extra_like_name)) AND ((:extra_receiver is null OR :extra_receiver = '') OR (documents.RECEIVER_NAME like :extra_like_receiver)) AND ('ALL' in (:extra_state) OR (documents.STATE_CODE in (:extra_state))) AND (documents.STATE_CODE != 'DELETED') AND (documents.KIND in (:extra_сlaimType))
